title: SERVERS DOWNNN
body: FOR THE LOVE OF BRONZE  WHY IS THE LEAGUE OCE SERVER NOT WORKING AHHHH SHITT {{summoner:4}}  for fun{{summoner:11}}  your mum

replies.body: my internet is fine but can't login either...
Are you with Optus? We've noticed a large number of Optus players having issues.
Telstra here, I can't logg in at all.. Keep saying i can't connect. My internet is fine lel {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Says the same thing for me

I'm with Optus and can't log in. Just says fail to connect to pvp.net and then closes the client.
Why don't you just change off this stupid pvp.net which is the source of constant problems.

yeah this bull%%%% game I played the first ranked today and my enemy team got loss prevented and i have 10LP gain
And I play the second game and I cannot login after the ban/pick screen and I return to the game 2 mins later and keep lagging and disconnecting, of course is a defeat from network problem and I got 16 LP deducted and NOT LOSS PREVENTED srsly I am uninstalling this bull%%%% game bye
